BR.name: 3D Sonic The Hedgehog
BR.description: O cientista malvado, Dr. Eggman (também conhecido como Dr. Robotnik), sequestrou os animais da South Island e os transformou em robôs escravos. Somente um herói pode derrotar o Dr. Eggman e resgatar os animais das suas mãos malignas - é o ouriço super legal com o cabelo azul espetado, Sonic! Corra na velocidade da luz através de sete zonas clássicas como Sonic, the Hedgehog. Corra e gire em loops enquanto coleta anéis e derrota inimigos na sua missão para salvar o mundo! Além da sua novíssima apresentação 3D, 3D Sonic The Hedgehog™ agora apresenta Seleção de Zona e o clássico golpe Spin Dash para ajudá-lo a sair a mil pelas Zonas e derrotar Badniks!

CA.name: 3D Sonic The Hedgehog
CA.description: The evil scientist, Dr. Eggman (aka Dr. Robotnik), has snatched the animals of South Island, turning them into robot slaves. Only one hero can defeat Dr. Eggman and rescue the animals from his vile clutches – it’s the super-cool hedgehog with the blue spiky hair, Sonic! Race at lightning speeds across seven classic zones as Sonic the Hedgehog. Run and spin through loop-de-loops as you collect rings and defeat enemies on your mission to save the world! In addition to its all-new 3D presentation, 3D Sonic The Hedgehog™ now features Zone Select and the classic Spin Dash move to help you zoom through Zones and take down Badniks!

MX.name: 3D Sonic The Hedgehog
MX.description: El malvado científico Dr. Eggman (alias Dr. Robotnik) ha capturado a los animalitos de South Island y los ha convertido en robots esclavos. Solo un héroe podrá derrotar al Dr. Eggman y rescatar a los animales de sus perversas garras, ¡el erizo más guay con púas azules, Sonic! Viaja a la velocidad de la luz por las siete zonas clásicas con Sonic the Hedgehog. ¡Corre y gira por los bucles mientras consigues Rings y derrotas a los enemigos en tu misión por salvar el mundo! ¡Además de los nuevos gráficos en 3D, en 3D Sonic The Hedgehog™ ahora podrás seleccionar zona y tendrás el clásico movimiento torbellino, que te ayudará a pasar por las zonas a toda velocidad y a acabar con los Badniks!

US.description: The evil scientist, Dr. Eggman (aka Dr. Robotnik), has snatched the animals of South Island, turning them into robot slaves. Only one hero can defeat Dr. Eggman and rescue the animals from his vile clutches – it’s the super-cool hedgehog with the blue spiky hair, Sonic! Race at lightning speeds across seven classic zones as Sonic the Hedgehog. Run and spin through loop-de-loops as you collect rings and defeat enemies on your mission to save the world! In addition to its all-new 3D presentation, 3D Sonic The Hedgehog™ now features Zone Select and the classic Spin Dash move to help you zoom through Zones and take down Badniks!
